## Plots

### Salario percibido por ocupación

```{r remedy15}
ds.perc01<- ggplot(data=ds.perc, aes(x=reorder(group1, desc(group1)), y=median, fill=ocup)) +
  geom_bar(position = 'dodge', stat='identity') +
  geom_text(aes(label=format(median, big.mark = ",", scientific = FALSE), y=0), position=position_dodge(0.9), hjust=-0.25) +
     theme_bw(base_size = 12) +
     scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
     ylab('Salario percibido (mediana)') + xlab('Años') +
     scale_fill_brewer(palette="Paired") +
     theme(legend.position="top") +
     labs(fill = " ") +
    coord_flip()
ds.perc01
```

```{r remedy16}
ggsave(ds.perc01,filename = "output/images/ds.perc01.png",device = "png",width = 30,height = 15,dpi = "retina",units = "cm")
```

### Brecha percibida 

```{r remedy19}
ds.gaper<- psych::describeBy(x = long01$gap_perc,group = long01$year,mat = T) %>% select(group1,n,mean,se,median,min,max) %>% mutate(brecha="Percibida")
```

### Brecha justa 

```{r remedy20}
ds.gajust<- psych::describeBy(x = long01$gap_just,group = long01$year,mat = T) %>% select(group1,n,mean,se,median,min,max) %>% mutate(brecha="Justa")
```

```{r remedy21}
ds.gaps<- bind_rows(ds.gaper,ds.gajust)
```

```{r remedy22}
ds.gaps01<-ggplot(data=ds.gaps, aes(x=reorder(group1, desc(group1)), y=median, fill=brecha)) +
  geom_bar(position = 'dodge', stat='identity') +
  geom_text(aes(label=format(round(median,digits = 2), big.mark = ",", scientific = FALSE), y=0),     position=position_dodge(0.9), hjust=-0.25) +
     theme_bw(base_size = 12) +
     scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
     ylab('Brecha salarial (mediana)') + xlab('Años') +
     scale_fill_brewer(palette="Paired") +
     theme(legend.position="top") +
     labs(fill = " ") +
     coord_flip()
ds.gaps01
```

```{r remedy23}

```

## Bivariados

```{r remedy24}
cormat<- cor(wide01 %>% select(starts_with("lngap_just"),starts_with("lngap_perc")),use = "complete.obs")
p.mat <- cor.mtest(wide01 %>% select(starts_with("lngap_just"),starts_with("lngap_perc")),use = "complete.obs")$p

colnames(cormat) <- c("Just (t1)","Just (t2)","Just (t3)","Just (t4)",
                      "Perc(t1)","Perc (t2)","Perc (t3)","Perc (t4)")

rownames(cormat) <- c("Justa (t1)","Justa (t2)","Justa (t3)","Justa (t4)",
                      "Percibida (t1)","Percibida (t2)","Percibida (t3)","Percibida (t4)")

```

```{r remedy25}
library(corrplot)
col <- colorRampPalette(c("#BB4444", "#EE9988", "#FFFFFF", "#77AADD", "#4477AA"))
png("output/images/cormat01.png", width = 1920, height = 1100,res = "200")
corrplot(cormat, method = "color",
         type = "upper", number.cex = .8,
         addCoef.col = "black", # Add coefficient of correlation
         tl.col = "black", tl.srt = 45, # Text label color and rotation
         # Combine with significance
         p.mat = p.mat, sig.level = 0.01, insig = "blank", 
         # hide correlation coefficient on the principal diagonal
         diag = FALSE)
dev.off()
```

```{r remedy26}
sjPlot::sjp.corr(wide01 %>% select(starts_with("lngap_just"),starts_with("lngap_perc")))
```

## Modelos 

```{r mov-educ}
load(file = here::here("input/data/proc/long01a.RData")) #base sin na.omit() y att fijos
load(file = here::here("input/data/proc/long01b.RData")) #base con na.omit() y att fijos
m16_con <- lm(lngap_just ~ mujer+edad+mov_subj_cwc+mov_subj_mean+mov_educ ,data=subset(long01a, year==2016))
m17_con <- lm(lngap_just ~ mujer+edad+mov_subj_cwc+mov_subj_mean+mov_educ ,data=subset(long01a, year==2017))
m18_con <- lm(lngap_just ~ mujer+edad+mov_subj_cwc+mov_subj_mean+mov_educ ,data=subset(long01a, year==2018))
m19_con <- lm(lngap_just ~ mujer+edad+mov_subj_cwc+mov_subj_mean+mov_educ ,data=subset(long01a, year==2019))

m16_cat <- lm(lngap_just ~ mujer+edad+sub_asc_cwc+sub_des_cwc+sub_asc_cgm+sub_des_cgm+mov_educ,data=subset(long01a, year==2016))
m17_cat <- lm(lngap_just ~ mujer+edad+sub_asc_cwc+sub_des_cwc+sub_asc_cgm+sub_des_cgm+mov_educ,data=subset(long01a, year==2017))
m18_cat <- lm(lngap_just ~ mujer+edad+sub_asc_cwc+sub_des_cwc+sub_asc_cgm+sub_des_cgm+mov_educ,data=subset(long01a, year==2018))
m19_cat <- lm(lngap_just ~ mujer+edad+sub_asc_cwc+sub_des_cwc+sub_asc_cgm+sub_des_cgm+mov_educ,data=subset(long01a, year==2019))

texreg::screenreg(l = list(m16_con,m17_con,m18_con,m19_con, 
                           m16_cat,m17_cat,m18_cat,m19_cat
                           ))

#modelos sin centrado
mov_con <- 
  lme4::lmer(lngap_just ~ year+mujer+edad+movsubj+mov_educ+lngap_perc+(1|idencuesta),data=long01b)

mov_cat <- 
  lme4::lmer(lngap_just ~ year+mujer+edad+mov_sub_c+mov_educ+lngap_perc+(1|idencuesta),data=long01b)

#modelos con centrado
mov_con_cent <- 
  lme4::lmer(lngap_just ~ year+mujer+edad+mov_subj_cwc+mov_subj_mean+mov_educ+lngap_perc+(1|idencuesta),data=long01b)

mov_cat_cent <- 
  lme4::lmer(lngap_just ~ year+mujer+edad+sub_asc_cwc+sub_des_cwc+sub_asc_cgm+sub_des_cgm+ mov_educ+lngap_perc+ (1|idencuesta),data=long01b)

omit <- c("year")
texreg::screenreg(l = list(mov_con,mov_con_cent, 
                           mov_cat,mov_cat_cent), 
                  omit.coef = "(year)|(edad)|(mujer)")
```
